divs: Sighting DetailsWhile waiting for a tran at the airport in San Francisco I Noticed an object that appeared to be glowing. Taking out my phone, I took the first picture. The object appeared to be hovering. As soon as I took the first pic. the object darted to the second position. I snapped the second pic. as soon as the camera would allow, about 1 second. The object then appeared to vanish! The time was about 9:15 PST. At the time I had no idea what it was. I just thought it might be something cool! Look at the pictures and decide for yourself.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around September 9th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Photographed object at San Francisco airport.
